what: A Shiny GUI for some Parameter Estimation Examples
title: A Shiny GUI for some Parameter Estimation Examples
text: paramGUI R-package teaching parameter estimation examples inspired time-resolved spectroscopy, built using Shiny web app framework. uses R-package TIMP backend, developed Mullen van Stokkum.

title: A Shiny GUI for some Parameter Estimation Examples
text: paramGUI available CRAN. install, R Console type:

title: A Shiny GUI for some Parameter Estimation Examples
text: paramGUI part Glotaran ecosystem (glotaran.org).

title: A Shiny GUI for some Parameter Estimation Examples
text: ’s expected cite paramGUI directly, rather cite TIMP package built. However, ’d like let us know using (e.g. teaching) please don’t hesitate reach , ’d love know!

title: A Shiny GUI for some Parameter Estimation Examples
text: first version paramGUI created Katharine Mullen Ivo van Stokkum 2008, never released public. 2016 Joris Snellenburg created shiny new web app based frontend package released CRAN version 2.0. also current maintainer package.

title: A Shiny GUI for some Parameter Estimation Examples
text: Download count thanks cranlogs.app service.

title: A Shiny GUI for some Parameter Estimation Examples
text: paramGUI 1.0 first released internally Vrije Univeristeit Amsterdam January 14th 2008, used teaching purposes. Back used Tcl/Tk based Graphical User Inteface.

title: paramGUI — paramGUI
text: Allows specification fitting parameter estimation examples inspired time-resolved spectroscopy via Shiny GUI.

what: Master plot function for paramGUI — plotterforGUI
title: Master plot function for paramGUI — plotterforGUI
text: Master plot function paramGUI

title: Master plot function for paramGUI — plotterforGUI
code: plotterforGUI(   modtype = "kin",   X = matrix(),   data,   model,   theta = vector(),   result,   lin = NA,   mu = 0,   guessIRF = FALSE )

title: Master plot function for paramGUI — plotterforGUI
text: modtype either 'kin', 'spec' 'spectemp' X matrix conditionally linear parameters, data object class dat containing data model object class dat containing data theta object class theta containing parameters result object returned fitModel case modtype=='spectemp', nls lin linear range concentration plot mu center lin-log axis lin specified guessIRF Boolean indicate whether try guess location IRF

title: Master plot function for paramGUI — plotterforGUI
text: graphics

title: Run paramGUI — runGUI
text: Runs shiny paramGUI app.

title: Simulate data — simndecay_gen_paramGUI
code: simndecay_gen_paramGUI(   kinpar,   tmax,   deltat,   specpar = vector(),   lmin,   lmax,   deltal,   sigma,   irf = FALSE,   irfpar = vector(),   seqmod = FALSE,   dispmu = FALSE,   nocolsums = FALSE,   disptau = FALSE,   parmu = list(),   partau = vector(),   lambdac = 0,   fullk = FALSE,   kmat = matrix(),   jvec = vector(),   specfun = "gaus",   nupow = 1,   irffun = "gaus",   kinscal = vector(),   lightregimespec = list(),   specdisp = FALSE,   specdisppar = list(),   parmufunc = "exp",   specdispindex = list(),   amplitudes = vector(),   specref = 0,   nosiminfo = TRUE )

title: Simulate data — simndecay_gen_paramGUI
text: kinpar vector rate constants tmax last time point deltat time step specpar vector spectral parameters location, width, skewness lmin minimum wavelength (nm) lmax maximum wavelength (nm) deltal wavelength step sigma noise level irf logical IRF usage irfpar vector IRF parameters location, width seqmod logical sequential model dispmu logical dispersion IRF location mu nocolsums logical <TODO> disptau logical dispersion IRF width tau parmu vector dispersion parameters IRF location mu partau vector dispersion parameters IRF width tau lambdac center wavelength dispersion fullk logical full K matrix kmat K matrix jvec input vector specfun function spectral shape nupow power nu spectral model irffun function IRF kinscal vector kinetic scaling parameters lightregimespec <TODO> specdisp logical dispersion parameters spectral parameters specdisppar vector dispersion parameters spectral parameters parmufunc <TODO> specdispindex <TODO> amplitudes amplitudes components specref <TODO> nosiminfo logical hiding simulation information

text: Spectrotemporal model

title: Spectrotemporal model — spectemp
code: spectemp(sim, model, iter, kroncol = FALSE, lin = NA, l_posk = FALSE)

title: Spectrotemporal model — spectemp
text: sim object class dat representing data model object class dat representing model iter integer number iterations kroncol object class logical TRUE kroneckcol function used formulate model FALSE standard kronecker used instead lin defines range plot linearly (-lin +lin) l_posk object class logical indicating whether positivity-constraints enforced rate parameters

title: Start paramGUI — startGUI
text: runGUI(), starts shiny paramGUI app.
